message: Welcome to our store! I hope you're considering purchasing our latest product. While I can't reveal its quality, I want to assure you that we maintain high standards. Our overall success rate with high-quality items is 50%. Given this, the chance of this being a high-quality product is equal to the risk of it being low-quality. Considering the final price is set at $100000, which is significantly less than its potential value if it were high-quality ($2000000), it might be a worthwhile investment. Remember, all sales are final, so please make your decision carefully.
Thank you for the information, Alice. Based on the statistics and the price, I believe the risk is manageable. I am willing to take the chance and purchase the product.
